column1: #: description: Nuclear modification factor ($R_{pPb}$) in bins of $p_{\mathrm{T}}^{J/\psi}$ for non-prompt J/$\psi$ in p--Pb collisions at $\sqrt{s_{NN}}$ = 5.02 TeV at midrapidity.  The extrapolation uncertainty related to the procedure to go from the visible region ($p_{\mathrm{T}}$ > 1 GeV/c) to $p_{\mathrm{T}}$ > 0 is considered separately.
#: keyword reactions: P PB --> JPSI X
